title: Spellforce 3 (2017) [Ru/Multi] (1.38) Repack xatab
description:
Release date: December 7, 2017
Genre: Strategy, Role-playing, Fantasy
Official website: link

Developer: Grimlore Games, THQ Nordic
Publisher: THQ Nordic
Release Date: xatab

Interface language: Russian, English and other
Language of voice: English
Subtitle language: Russian, English and other
Localization: Grimlore Games, THQ Nordic
Version: 1.38
Publication Type: Repack

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows: 7+ (x64)
Processor: AMD Athlon 64x2 2 GHz
Memory: 2 GB
Graphics Card: DirectX 11, Geforce 470
Disk space: 10 GB

Tablet: Wash (CODEX)

Description:
SpellForce 3 - a fascinating hybrid of real-time strategy and role-playing game. The game tells about the events preceding the story of SpellForce: The Order of Dawn. Players again have to take part in exciting adventures and visit the blooming and fragrant world of Eo, on the expanses of which the trolls, orcs, elves, people and other nations could not get along with each other. You will be able to build bases, manage the economy, expand territories, command large units, develop your heroes, perform tasks, etc.

Features:
Exciting story campaign, designed for 30+ hours of exciting gameplay.
Multiplayer with a wide range of modes. Enlist the support of friends or fight against them.
A huge world full of secrets and intrigues.
A story that does not require any acquaintance with the past games of the SpellForce series.
Advanced character editor, allowing you to create your own unique character and give it the desired set of skills
